channel.title: Wagneric - Metacognition/Watches [Experimental Minimal Strings]
channel.description:
I'm currently exploring things with strings (or metal bars), largely avoiding other instruments/samples for the moment.
[Metacognition](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180330-metacognition) [10:09] is a more-complete/experimental exploration of the orchestral strings sound pack, including some darker Amon-Tobin-esque textures.
In [Watches](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180406-string-theory-watches) [5:05], my 1.5-year-old son and I take on both minimalism and serialism.
